name: AllAboutCholesterol
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: There are many kinds of cholesterol. These are LDL cholesterol and HDL cholesterol. LDL cholesterol is also known as “bad” cholesterol. LDL lipoproteins are deposited in the wall of the artery that is why high levels of LDL are related with an increase of heart disease. HDL cholesterols are called “good” cholesterol because HDL cholesterol elements prevent atherosclerosis by removing the bad cholesterol on the artery walls. Enable our skill to find out All About Cholesterol in short daily flashes. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
